1002.description: Fire <shuzhi>2</> missiles with each attack, dealing damage to the target. Each missile deals damage equal to <shuzhi>34.8%</> of ATK.

1005.description: Fire <shuzhi>4</> missiles with each attack, dealing damage to the target. Each missile deals damage equal to <shuzhi>34.8%</> of ATK.

1006.description: Reduce physical damage received by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1007.description: Colossus Arm lasts for <shuzhi>30</> seconds. All damage taken for this duration is reduced by <shuzhi>20%</>.

1008.description: Slow enemies that pass through the shield by <shuzhi>50%</> for <shuzhi>2</> seconds.

1013.description: Reduce frost damage received by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1014.description: When Wanderers or allies pass through the Omnium Shield, damage dealt increases by <shuzhi>25%</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

1022.description: When piloting the armor, gain immunity to flame damage and control effects.

1023.description:
Gain the <yellow_lbl_14_1>Artillery Fire</> skill.
<yellow_lbl_14_1>Artillery Fire</>: Fire <shuzhi>6</> times at the locked-on target. Each hit deals damage equal to <shuzhi>155.2%</> of ATK.

1026.description: When piloting the armor, dealing damage also inflicts burn.

1027.description: Increase flame damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1028.description:
Gain the <yellow_lbl_14_1>Flame Domain</> skill.
<yellow_lbl_14_1>Flame Domain</>: Erect a wide-range Flame Domain at the current location, dealing damage equal to a maximum of <shuzhi>1,146.8%</> of ATK.

1029.description: Enemies caught within the rift who are close to the ground are unable to dodge, and the vacuum duration is increased to <shuzhi>15</> seconds.

1032.description: Increase damage dealt to targets in the area by <shuzhi>20%</>.

1034.description: Reduce flame damage received by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1035.description: Enemies within the rift are unable to receive any healing.

1036.description: Stun targets for <shuzhi>3</> seconds. Cooldown: <shuzhi>180</> seconds.

1037.description: Increase damage dealt by energy pulses by <shuzhi>30%</>.

1041.description: Increase physical damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1042.description: Trigger a seismic wave every <shuzhi>3</> seconds, <shuzhi>suspending targets</>. The waves can be dodged by jumping.

1050.description: Remove all control effects and grant immunity to control effects for the next <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

1054.description: Every <shuzhi>5</> seconds, additionally grant Wanderers one stack of inspiration, increasing damage dealt by <shuzhi>5%</> per stack.

1055.description: Reduce volt damage received by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1056.description: The Wanderer's attacks convert <shuzhi>20%</> of damage dealt into HP for the duration of the drone.

1067.description: Increase damage dealt by holograms to <shuzhi>75%</> of the Wanderer's damage.

1068.description: Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.

1069.description: Increase volt damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1070.description: Increase damage dealt by holograms to <shuzhi>100%</> of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.

1088.description: Gain the <yellow_lbl_14_1>Laser Matrix</> skill: Freeze targets after dealing damage to them <shuzhi>4</> times in a row and deal damage equal to a maximum of <shuzhi>93.2%</> of ATK.

1090.description: Increase frost damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1091.description: Gain the <yellow_lbl_14_1>Crash</> skill: Deal damage to the target equal to <shuzhi>55.9%</> of ATK and stun them for <shuzhi>0.5</> seconds.

1107.description: Replenish 1 charge every <shuzhi>100</> seconds. Gliding no longer expends endurance.

1109.description: Gliding for longer than 3 seconds empowers the next pummel attack to stun the target for 2 seconds.

1111.description: Reduce physical damage received by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1114.description: <shuzhi>Stun</> targets for <shuzhi>2</> seconds on hit, and burn them.

1118.description: Increase flame damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1119.description: <shuzhi>Stun</> targets for <shuzhi>3</> seconds on hit and tire them for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, causing targets to lose <shuzhi>100</> endurance after every ability use.

1121.description: Gain <shuzhi>10</> weapon charge points every second while gliding.

1124.description: Jetboard collision damage is increased by <shuzhi>100%</>, and charge time is reduced to <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

1125.description: Reduce frost damage received by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1126.description: Immune to control effects while using the Jetboard. Using the Jetboard to attack and hit targets <shuzhi>stuns</> them for <shuzhi>5</> seconds. Charge time is reduced to <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

1132.description: Increase volt damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1133.description: Those caught in tornadoes have a <shuzhi>50%</> chance to be disoriented for <shuzhi>3</> seconds each time they take damage. Movement direction inputs will also be swapped.

1144.description: +<shuzhi>100%</> damage in Quantum state, negated after <shuzhi>1</> successful attack.

1146.description: Increase volt damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1147.description: +<shuzhi>100%</> damage in Quantum state, negated after <shuzhi>3</> successful attacks.

1148.description: Number of missiles launched increases every second.

1153.description: Increase physical damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1154.description: Number of missiles launched every second is further increased.

1155.description: Produce an EM shield that reduces damage taken by <shuzhi>20%</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

1160.description: Increase frost damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1161.description: Reduce final damage of targets hit by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>7</> seconds.

1162.description: Can be used while under control effects.

1165.description: Grant immunity to control effects for the next <shuzhi>5</> seconds.

1166.description: Upon hitting the target, plant a <shuzhi>7</>-second Magnetic Bomb that detonates if the target uses normal attacks/dodges/skills, causing <shuzhi>40%</> Slow for <shuzhi>5</> seconds, and disappears after detonation.

1167.description: Reduce volt damage received by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1168.description: Detonating the Magnetic Bomb removes all current buffs from the target.

1188.description: When the shield is broken, reduce the speed of the attacker and nearby enemies by <shuzhi>35%</> for <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

1190.description: After the shield breaks or ends, increase final damage by an amount equal to the percentage of HP lost. This lasts for <shuzhi>10</> seconds. Increase damage by a minimum of <shuzhi>30%</>.

1191.description: After the shield breaks or ends, increase speed by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

1192.description: Reduce flame damage received by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1193.description: When the shield breaks, gain a <shuzhi>5</>-second damage reflection effect, reflecting <shuzhi>0.6</>× damage taken back at the attacker.

1195.description: Allied Wanderers in the dimension recovers <shuzhi>15%</> HP <shuzhi>8</> seconds later.

1196.description: Allied units in the dimension gain <shuzhi>25%</> lifesteal.

1199.description: Allied Wanderers in the dimension gain immunity to all control effects.

1200.description: Increase frost damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1201.description: Until the Relic disappears, allied Wanderers in the dimension double all lifesteal effects when HP drops to <shuzhi>40%</> or below.

1202.description: After activating the Strange Cube, increase damage dealt by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

1205.description: After activating the Strange Cube, reduce weapon charge of nearby enemies by <shuzhi>200</>.

1207.description: Increase volt damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1208.description: After activating the Strange Cube, gain weapon charge based on HP lost. For every <shuzhi>1%</> of HP lost, gain <shuzhi>10</> weapon charge.

1209.description: Increase duration of energy pillars to <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

1212.description: Increase endurance regen speed by 30% for <shuzhi>20</> seconds after switching to the Omnium Handcannon.

1214.description: Increase flame damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1236.description: Grant <shuzhi>100</> energy immediately upon use if HP is greater than <shuzhi>90%</>. If HP is less than <shuzhi>90%</>, immediately grant <shuzhi>50</> energy, then <shuzhi>50</> more energy once the damage increase expires.

1237.description: Increase the duration of Type II Couant's damage boost to <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

1238.description: Increase Type II Couant's damage boost limit to <shuzhi>70%</>.

1239.description: Increase flame damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1240.description: If the amount of missing HP is greater than the current HP, grant a damage boost based on a percentage of missing HP (up to <shuzhi>70%</>).

1241.description: When the shield is broken, reduce the speed of the attacker and nearby enemies by <shuzhi>35%</> for <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

1242.description: After the shield breaks or ends, increase final damage by <shuzhi>20%</> for <shuzhi>10</> seconds.

1243.description: After the shield breaks or ends, increase speed by <shuzhi>30%</> for <shuzhi>6</> seconds.

1244.description: Reduce flame damage received by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1245.description: When the shield breaks, gain a <shuzhi>5</>-second damage reflection effect, reflecting <shuzhi>0.6</>× damage taken back at the attacker.

1249.description: Increase volt damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1250.description: Those caught in tornadoes have a <shuzhi>50%</> chance to be disoriented for <shuzhi>3</> seconds each time they take damage. Movement direction inputs will also be swapped.

1251.description: <shuzhi>Stun</> targets for <shuzhi>2</> seconds on hit, and burn them.

1254.description: Increase flame damage by <shuzhi>1.5%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1255.description: <shuzhi>Stun</> targets for <shuzhi>3</> seconds on hit and tire them for <shuzhi>10</> seconds, causing targets to lose <shuzhi>100</> endurance after every ability use.

1257.description: Endurance cost is halved on the ground, no cost in the water.

1259.description: Increase flame damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1262.description: Reduce availability for each dice to <shuzhi>20</> seconds.

1263.description: <shuzhi>Thermonuclear</> Damage Boost: Gain a <shuzhi>25%</> damage boost for <shuzhi>45</> seconds.

1264.description: After each roll of dice, there is a <shuzhi>50%</> chance of getting 1 die. Cooldown: <shuzhi>15 seconds</>.

1265.description: Increase frost damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1266.description: Rolling <shuzhi>3</> dice will grant all the elemental damage boosts. If their sum is <shuzhi>14</> or more, gain the <shuzhi>Overclock</> effect.

1269.description: Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.

1270.description: Increase volt damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1271.description: Increase damage dealt by holograms to <shuzhi>50%</> of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.

1273.description: Recover to full endurance when using the Mini Pelican, not effective when exhausted.

1274.description: The Mini Pelican can store up to <shuzhi>3</> charges.

1275.description: Increase volt damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1276.description: Reduces cooldown to <shuzhi>30</> seconds and unlocks the Mini Pelican paint: <shuzhi>Pigmentation</>.

1278.description: While <shuzhi>Micro Attack</> is active, increase damage dealt against grievous targets by <shuzhi>20%</>.

1280.description: Increase physical damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1281.description: Restore HP to full when marking a weapon with Overdrive Shot. Restore HP equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of Max HP instead in Apex League.

1282.description: Grant <shuzhi>100</> energy immediately upon use if HP is greater than <shuzhi>90%</>. If HP is less than <shuzhi>90%</>, immediately grant <shuzhi>50</> energy, then <shuzhi>50</> more energy once the damage increase expires.

1283.description: Increase the duration of damage boost to <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

1284.description: Every stack of blessing additionally increases final damage by <shuzhi>1%</> for <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

1285.description: Increase flame damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1286.description: When there are a full 5 stacks of blessing, additionally increase final damage by <shuzhi>2.5%</> and reduce damage received by <shuzhi>5%</> for <shuzhi>12</> seconds.

1288.description: While <shuzhi>Micro Attack</> is active, increase damage dealt against grievous targets by <shuzhi>20%</>.

1291.description: Restore HP to full when marking a weapon with Overdrive Shot. Restore HP equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of Max HP instead in Apex League.

1292.description: Thalassic Heart will raise the tide <shuzhi>1</> time every <shuzhi>15</> seconds, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>15%</> (<shuzhi>1.5%</> in Apex League) of the Wanderer's Max HP to nearby targets.

1293.description: Thalassic Heart duration is extended to <shuzhi>90</> seconds.

1294.description: Damage dealt to targets hit by Thalassic Heart is additionally increased by <shuzhi>5.5%</>.

1295.description: Increase volt damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1296.description:
While diving, use Thalassic Heart to transform into a dolphin for up to <shuzhi>45</> seconds, during which enemies will not attack for <shuzhi>15</> seconds, and movement speed will be increased.
While transformed, the next attack will thrash the seawater, dealing damage equal to <shuzhi>25%</> (<shuzhi>2.5%</> in Apex League) of your Max HP to nearby targets, and will end the transformation.

1298.description: Restore HP to full when marking a weapon with Overdrive Shot. Restore HP equal to <shuzhi>20%</> of Max HP instead in Apex League.

1300.description: Increase physical damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1301.description: While <shuzhi>Micro Attack</> is active, increase damage dealt against grievous targets by <shuzhi>4%</>.

1302.description: Zephyr duration is extended to <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

1303.description: In the zephyr state, speed on the ground and walls is increased by <shuzhi>15%</> and jump height is increased.

1304.description: Speedwalkers can store up to <shuzhi>2</> charges.

1305.description: Reduce physical damage received by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1306.description: During zephyr, each hit from aerial attacks recovers dodge attempts and aerial dodges recover all endurance.

1307.description: Increase the number of small bubbles fired. The wielder also moves backward when firing small bubbles. After firing the relic, increase speed by <shuzhi>10%</> for <shuzhi>30</> seconds.

1308.description: Gain <shuzhi>1</> / <shuzhi>3</> stacks of Happy Time after firing small and large bubbles, respectively. Each stack increases the Wanderer's damage dealt by <shuzhi>1.8%</> for <shuzhi>60</> seconds, stacking up to <shuzhi>5</> times.

1309.description: Use the Bubble Gun to summon a Bubble Spirit that fires bubbles and refreshes the duration of Happy Time. The Spirit lasts <shuzhi>150</> seconds.

1310.description: Increase flame damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.

1311.description: Increase the Happy Time damage boost by an additional <shuzhi>0.6%</> per stack.

1315.description: Increase frost damage by <shuzhi>2%</>, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
